All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddPeashooterCommand
Command to add a Peashooter plant to the game board.
AddSunflowerCommand
Command to add a Sunflower plant to the game board.
AddWallnutCommand
Command to add a Wallnut plant to the game board.
AttackingZombie
Represents an attacking zombie in the game.
Command
Interface representing a command that can be executed on a game board.
Container
An abstract class representing a container that holds a position in a 2D space.
Cooldown
Class that implements a cooldown mechanism for actions based on a specified average action speed.
EntityActions
Abstract class EntityActions extends Entity and implements Actions interface, representing entities that can perform actions in the game.
Game
The Game class is a singleton that manages the game sessions and gameplay flow.
GameBoard
The GameBoard class represents the game area where entities and projectiles interact.
GameMemento
Represents a snapshot of the game's state at a specific point in time.
GamePanel
 
GameSession
Manages a session of the game, including the game loop, command scheduling, and user input handling.
GardenComposite
Composite class that represents a garden containing multiple game entities.
HealthObserver
An implementation of the Observer interface that outputs health updates to the console.
ILevelFactory
Interface representing a factory for creating game levels.
KeyHandler
 
Level
Represents a level in the game, containing a list of zombies, their spawn locations, the time of day, and the terrain type.
LevelManager
Singleton class that manages the current game level.
Main
 
Plant
Represents a plant entity in the game, extending EntityActions.
Plant.Builder
Builder class for creating Plant instances.
Plant.Director
Director class for constructing specific types of plants.
PlantFactory
Abstract factory class for creating plants and mushrooms.
PlantSelectionMenu
 
Projectile
Represents a projectile in the game.
Score
Singleton class that manages the game's score.
SoundEffect
 
State
Interface representing the state of a plant.
UserGUI
 
Zombie
 
ZombieFactory
